Reviews.Title: It's so, so!
Reviews.Author: Johnny Pesterfield
Reviews.Content: I not real happy with it. I don't like Windows 8. The computer keeps dropping the internet service and I have to click on fix the problem and it fix the problem, but it happens several times. I know it's not the internet service because my son is online also and he doesn't have the problem. It would probably be okay if you just used it for casual use but I wouldn't recommend it if you use the internet a lot.

Reviews.Title: Awesome laptop
Reviews.Author: Felix Fernando De La Cruz
Reviews.Content: Great price for the specs. Really like the design and the materials (no glossy plastic). 6 GB of ram is very good for simple use, like web surfing and some light softwares. Boots very fast.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Shimmarie T Fuger
Reviews.Content: The Dell Inspiron 15.6 Inch Laptop is just what I need for school. The screen is the right size for me, it isn't to big as were I feel like I have this huge monster of a laptop on my lap. And it's not so small that I can't see what's on the screen.It is a little slow with rebooting or turning on.I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a laptop for school.

Reviews.Title: Maybe or maybe not will see
Reviews.Author: Angel Plata
Reviews.Content: I'm really scare since I'm the first to buy this product, amazon have been always realable to me so I took the shoot I hope Ijust di right. Well now into bussiness the video card is integrated, so it uses RAM for video, that's why come with 6 gb I may think, the processor is real good one, better than Intel Pentium Dual Core 2127U, that comes with similar systems, is heavy maybe too much. I will said the rest when I get it. see ya all
